entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
